text: "Fortunate Son" is a 1969 song by Creedence Clearwater Revival. It was taken from their fourth studio album Willy and the Poor Boys. It went to number 3 in the United States and number 144 in France. It was covered by Bob Seger in 1986 for his 13th studio album Like a Rock. John Fogerty reworked the single with the Foo Fighters in 2013 for his 9th studio album Wrote a Song for Everyone. ==References== Category:1969 songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Roots rock songs Category:Creedence Clearwater Revival songs Category:Bob Seger songs Category:Foo Fighters songs Category:Death Cab for Cutie songs Category:Wyclef Jean songs Category:Santana (band) songs Category:U2 songs Category:Pearl Jam songs Category:Bruce Springsteen songs
title: Fortunate Son
